name: Roommejts AB
description: Roommejts AB is focused on helping clients make smarter, data-driven decisions about interior layouts, renovations, and construction planning. By combining software and automation, they aim to simplify how architects, property managers, and designers plan and optimize living or office spaces.

name: Sysarb AB
description: Sysarb AB is a Sweden-based HR-tech company with nearly 20 years of experience, positioning itself as one of Europe's pioneering and leading voices in pay equity and pay transparency.

name: Up Planner | Up Adviser
description: Up is a free, user-friendly financial life-planning tool that allows anyone to craft and visualize their financial future through simple, interactive simulations.

name: Pharus Tech AB
description: Pharus Tech is an HR-tech company specializing in AI-driven data analytics and talent acquisition tools. Formerly known as JobAgent and is based in Stockholm.
